reviews.review: This is probably the only game that I can universally recommend. It's good. Play it now.
The Cake is a Lie, and Wheatley is a Moron
Juego imprescindible de tener en la biblioteca
Better than the original, and thatâ€™s saying a lot, because the original was already one of my favorite games of ALL time.

Will only make you appreciate the first game more.

Wait for a sale.
You should still play it, but I would not recommend the game based on its own merits.
The new mechanics were neat I guess.
One of the best puzzle games I have ever experienced!

The puzzles are quite thought provoking and fun to figure out, the story is a lot of fun as well. Those who enjoy a good story riddled with puzzles with love this game

Oh, hi. So, how are you holding up? Because I'm a potato! [slow clap] Oh, good. My slow
clap processor made it into this thing. So we have that. Since it doesn't look like we're going
anywhere... well, we are going somewhere. [...] And you just put him in charge of the entire
facility. [slow clap] Good, that's still working.
[b] 11/10 [/b]

It's great. If you have made it to 2022 without playing it..

Hi, welcome to planet earth. It's not a good time to be here right now, maybe come back in a few years?
YUM PORTAL CONSUMED ME I AM CONSUMED BY PORTAL I PORTAL'D TO SPAIN
this is the most amazing game on steam.

Portal 2 is one of my favorite games its funny and entertaining from start to finish has some decently difficult but rewarding puzzles and should be included in the orange box if your a fan of portal 1 and are thinking about buying portal 2 you really should portal 2 has more content a better story (in my opinion) and has graphical improvements over the first the game is about 6 hours long and is enjoyable start to finish.

En general es bueno pero cansa, muy rapido y se vuelve un poco repetitivo hacia la mitad del juego. TerminÃ© jugando con un video de como pasar los puzzles y con ayuda de un amigo porque queria simplemente pasarme el juego, pero no lo terminÃ© gozando tanto como el primero, porque no era una experiencia tan corta y fresca.

Sin embargo el juego mejora muchisimas cosas en cuanto a graficos, gameplay y amplia muchisimo la historia. lo mejor de todo es que ahora el modelo de Chell no da sida :D

Man I'm genuinely surprised. I never thought I'd enjoy a puzzle game. Portal 1 proved me wrong. But it was a short game and I was sure that if it was any longer I wouldn't have enjoyed it as much as I did. Portal 2 was way longer with a lot more complicated puzzles so it obviously scared me. And once again I was wrong. Both of the Portal games are incredibly fun. Even if I suck at them I still had tons of fun.

+The game looks beautiful, sounds great and plays really well.
+I love the characters. The voice acting, their personalities, the things they say and do. Its all perfect.
+Just like the first game really short loading times. It can get a bit annoying if you keep dying like i do but otherwise its not bad.
+The puzzles get a lot more complicated and we have a lot of new tools we can use to solve these puzzles.
+The game is a lot longer then the first one.
+From the start to the finish its all just a lot of fun. What else do you want from a game ?
+Co-op game mode ! You can play with your friends.

-The loading scenes can ruin some of the adrenaline and the fun, excitement of some scenes. Fortunately just like the first game the loading screens are short. And just like the first game there is a lot of them.

Even if you hate puzzles games you should still try out the Portal series. I recommend buying the Portal bundle this way you'll get both Portal 1 and 2. Both of them are great games. Obviously don't jump into Portal 2 without finishing Portal 1.

Portal Two is a intricate game full of confusing puzzles and gripping story line.I really enjoy this game as it begins with simple puzzles that lure your into false sense of security as when your get further on the puzzles become mind-bogginly confusing and difficult.
This game is far from repetitive which was unexpected as I thought it would just be placung portals down but the amount of content and new things that come at you from every angle is Excellent!
Also the emotional connection you end up feeling towards the small amount of characters in this game is nothing like I've ever experienced before.
This game is awesome 10/10 would recommend.
